articles.title: Juventus vs. Crotone - Football Match Report - February 22, 2021 - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Get a report of the Juventus vs. Crotone 2020-21 Italian Serie A football match.
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo scored twice as Juventus strolled to a 3-0 home win over bottom side Crotone in Serie A on Monday, with the victory taking the champions up to third in the standings.
